directions: In a blender, combine a 24-oz. jar of mango slices and 2 cups ice cubes; cover and blend until smooth.
Stir into 2 cups chilled apricot nectar and 1 cup chilled apple cider (check label to make sure it has been pasteurized). Serve in glasses rimmed with orange sugar crystals.

see savings 2 cups chilled apricot nectar

see savings orange sugar crystals, for rim
title: Spooky Spirits
